text.0: soma the steer effused for draught flows to the purifying sieve.
text.1: slaying the fiends loving the gods.
text.2: farsighted tawnycoloured he flows to the sieve intelligent.
text.3: bellowing to his place of rest.
text.4: this vigorous pavamana runs forth to the luminous realm of heaven.
text.6: this payamana up above tritas high ridge hath made the sun.
text.8: this vṛtraslaying steer effused soma roomgiver neer deceived.
text.9: hath gone as twere to win the spoil.
text.10: urged onward by the sage the god speeds forward to the casks of wood.
